Articles.Content:
I often have long engines where the stock legs are not long enough, so I am looking for a mod pack that has some really nice landing legs (size L/XL). I've tried the SpaceX legs, but they do not fold down far enough and when they do the legs are too long for my use, sticking out in front of the craft when retracted. 

Are there any mods out there with nice choices for landing legs?
Pretty sure one of Necrobone's mods has some big lander legs
The biggest legs are probably the ones from SpaceY heavy lifters mod by Necrobones.
Kerbodyne Plus also has some huge legs.
